summary: WHEEL WELLS ARE CUT TO HIGH LETTING WATER AND ROAD GRIME INTO MY ENGINE AND ELECTRIC.  I HAVE TAKEN MY DURANGO BACK TO THE DEALER EVERY OTHER WEEK SINCE I BOUGHT IT,FOR STEERING,TV SCREEN,VALVE STEMS,AND ONCE FOR I DON'T KNOW, IT JUST SAT IN BACK FOR ONE AND A HALF HOURS.  THIS LAST TIME IT WAS FOR KNOCKING IN THE FRONT END.  I HAVE ONLY HAD THE DURANGO FOR 8 WEEKS!!!THE RACK AND PINION STEERING IS OUT.  *NM
